data.text: As Superbowl Sunday looms—with $1.67 billion in bets expected—Americans need protection against online sports betting companies & prediction markets that exploit problem gamblers. My legislation is a start. https://t.co/bDdIN6K6zX

Rot&corruption within DOJ cry out for an Independent Prosecutor—a watchdog professional who can uncover&undo the decay destroying federal law enforcement. Trump will resist it—having already neutered IG’—so Congress must act. Can Republicans grow a spine? https://t.co/7bq4AoTgtu

Profligate Big Tech must bear the societal costs of its skyrocketing AI spending—rising costs of electricity, water, construction, & much more. Companies not consumers should pay. Bipartisan legislation must impose accountability. I’m working on it. https://t.co/nuw5ouCEUu

Immigration agents opened fire on Daniel Rascon & his family when their car was unlawfully stopped. While he carries the weight of this incident, his bravery serves as motivation for us all to demand change. https://t.co/NE7uV1C1an

After hearing from U.S. citizens victimized by ICE & CBP's violence & brutality at my spotlight forum, I joined @PsakiBriefing to discuss the need to rein in DHS & its lawlessness. https://t.co/lO22FIaQuu
Honoring his sister, Renée Nicole Macklin Good, Brent Ganger speaks at my spotlight forum on the excessive use of force by ICE agents. https://t.co/EdGCmH1xuy

Having Trump nationalize our elections is chillingly unconstitutional. 

I discussed this possible step towards totalitarianism with @MSNOWNews. https://t.co/N5bar0F0gV

Powerful witnesses bear the scars—physical & emotional—of DHS & ICE lawless brutality. Their faces & voices add momentum to our demands for far reaching reform, a total overhaul of this out of control agency. Unless those demands are met, no more funding for DHS. https://t.co/OKVPYr9iOV

Aliya Rahman was assaulted & violently dragged from her car by immigration agents—& then detained without access to medical care. Despite the severe physical & mental toll, she is unafraid to demand accountability. https://t.co/D3AUGSfnqs
At my spotlight forum, Luke Ganger—brother of Renée Nicole Macklin Good—remembers his sister & honors her legacy. https://t.co/PNidPO50pX
